name: Musk-Cat-Tiers
description:
Mus -Kat-tiers
A coopetarive game developed by PewPewGames,  which tells the story of four space cats that "fall to earth" and must recover their catnip cargo before returning to their mission. Your teamwork will be essential to complete your goals.

Theme: Down to Earth

Team: Pew Pew Games

Valentina Plazas/v.plazasd@hotmail.com

Estefania Copete/wolfestefa30@gmail.com

Milena Zapata/ anamitm3@gmail.com

Alejandro Apolinar/Apolejo1206@hotmail.com

Diego Espitia/mega17cric@gmail.com

Game Instructions: Each cat has his own fundamental skill to solve the puzzle planned in the level.

Single Player - Multiplayer

In Single Player mode and up to 3 players you can use the letter F or "Right Trigger" to toggle between the different characters. Each player's skills are shown graphically in the interface of each character. 

Each cat has his own platform to explore!

Manly can load objects with the E key and with the "X or Square" button.

Zippy has a very good speed and double jump.

Fatty can land on some kind of blocks to destroy them.

And Pettite can go through little tunnels.

The camera is controlled with the mouse or with the Right Joystick. You must collect 5 catnip bags for each character to finish the level.

All the contents were developed during the times of the Epic Mega Jam.
